hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Fairy Bottle#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Bow#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Green Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Ganon's Tower#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #generic grotto#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #cow behind webs# in a grotto gifts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Haunted Wasteland#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Queen Gohma# holds...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a #generic grotto#.

LH (Lab).text: Why are the floating skulls called "Bubbles" and the floating bubbles "Shaboms"?

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: Why are you asking me? I don't have any answers! I'm just as confused as you are!
